suggested_yarn: Knit Picks Wool of the Andes Worsted
full_text: Cute little stuffed wool hearts. These knit up quickly in the round and can be used as decorations, gift toppers, added to garland, wreaths, vases and more. Size: 3” (7.5 cm) wide, 2.5” (6.5 cm) wide Yarn and Materials Worsted Weight Wool – each heart uses approximately 11 yards (10 meters) and a small amount of Poly-fil or stuffing of choice I used Knitpicks Wool of the Andes in the following colours: Blossom Heather (light pink) Rose Heather (medium pink) Hollyberry (dark red) Needles and Tools Set of US7 (4.5mm) Double Point Needles Darning Needle Stitch Holder (or circular needle US7 or smaller)
name: Ravelry: Little Wool Hearts pattern by Heather Pelletier
